name: Around the World in 8 Miliseconds
description: Using the power of the World Population API this app gets population of a country and tells you where it ranks in order of world population.

name: CRM Light
description: This is a simple CRM meant for use by small businesses and sole proprietors that need a simple app to keep track of customers and potential customers.

name: GymCRM
description: This is a Customer Relationship tool meant for small, club style gyms in more niche sectors. Think CrossFit, Jiu Jitsu, and powerlifting. It's an easy and light tool meant to be ultra affordable.

name: Budget Tracker
description: This is a simple Budget Tracker that uses Progressive Web App technology to allow users to make changes locally without a connection and then it connects and updates upon recconecting

name: ReadME Generator
description: This app is a Node app built with the npm package inquirer to output a readme based on user input through the terminal. Please note, there is no deployed url for this app.

name: Portfolio
description: This is portfolio used to showcase my work and my improvement with UI's and React. More work will be included in this section as I continue to work on my skills.
